p.d: Rita tries every means possible to add more spice to the Heritage Day festivities, which leads to a conflict with Gilberte. When Father Tremblay comes for a visit, the two women try to get the former priest on their side. But he has his own worries to contend with. Directed by: Jean-Marc Piché (season 2, Canada, 2019) Screenplay: Patricia Léger Cast: Patricia Léger (Rita Melanson), Marie-Jo Thério (Yolande LeBlanc), Marcel-Romain Thériault (Lomer Dupuis), Marc Lamontagne (Edmour LeBlanc), Raphaël Butler (Ferraille Gaudet), Claire Normand (Gilberte Cormier), Gabriel Robichaud (Zoël Bourgeois), Bianca Richard (Terri Cormier) Genre: comedy
